buginformation.summary: tar utils parse name does not properly handle characters outside the range 127
buginformation.description: tarfile contains files with special characters the names the tar entries are wrong example correct name 0302 0601 220 lalala can 060302 moe model name resolved tarutils parsename 0302 0101 3ﾱﾱﾱf 06ﾱw 220ﾱzb ﾱheckmodul ﾱﾱﾱﾱﾱﾱﾱﾱﾱﾱece ﾱﾱdc ﾱﾱﾱ07ﾱ060302ﾱdoern model please use result append new string new byte buffer instead result append char buffer solve this encoding problem
